notifications.upload_success: The file has been uploaded and indexed successfully in the vault.

search.title: Technical Assistant
search.subtitle: Connected to engineering manuals
search.welcome_title: How can I help you today?
search.welcome_desc: I have access to all technical documentation, schematics, and maintenance procedures.
search.error_connection: I had a connection problem. Please try again.
search.error_message: Sorry, I lost connection to the knowledge base. Could you try asking me again?
search.disclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Verify critical information in original manuals.

suggested.q1: Error E45 in Arca II maneuver

steps.welcome_content: The AI that understands your technical documentation. To start, what is your primary role?
steps.upload_content: Drag a PDF, Word or technical text. Don't have one handy? Try our demo document.
steps.ask_content: Based on the document you uploaded (or the demo one), try asking something technical.
steps.explore_content: We've customized your dashboard based on your role. You're all set to go!

help.title: Contextual Help Center
help.subtitle: Technical information and usage tips for this section.

upload-documents.title: Upload Technical Documents
upload-documents.content: You can upload PDFs, images, and Word documents. The system will automatically analyze the content and index it for future searches.
upload-documents.example: Ex: Manual ARCA II, wiring diagrams, maintenance procedures
tips: Use files in good condition (legible, well-scanned)
PDFs with OCR text index better

search-query.title: How to Search Better
search-query.content: Write questions in natural language, as if talking to a technician. The system will search all your documents automatically.
search-query.example:
✅ Good examples:
• What is the main motor torque?
• Door calibration procedure
• What does code E07 mean?
tips: Be specific: include the model if important
You can follow up: 'And the wait time?'
If you don't find an answer, try rephrasing

report-hub.title: Report Generation
report-hub.content: Create technical PDF documents based on the analysis of your knowledge assets.
tips: Choose a template according to the type of analysis you need
Filter by date to analyze specific periods
Reports include direct citations to the manuals

upload-dropzone.title: Document Vault
upload-dropzone.content: Drag files here for the RAG to process so you can query them.
tips: We support technical PDFs, blueprints, and manuals
Processing usually takes between 30 and 90 seconds

confidence-scores.title: Confidence Levels
confidence-scores.content: Indicates how sure the system is that the answer is accurate according to the documents.
tips: High: Found literally in the text

audit-logs.title: Audit Trail
audit-logs.content: Full traceability of every action performed on the platform for regulatory compliance.
tips: Use the correlationId to track actions end-to-end

empty.desc: Your recent actions will appear here
empty.title: No recent activity
